e: ￹`O~ `roma~ `a~ `tamdaw~ `i~ `ma~`olah~ `ci~`ngraan~. `O~ `roma~ `i~ `caay~ `ka~ `olah~.￺Some people like him; some don't￻有人喜歡他也有人不喜歡他
￹`O~ `roma~, `o~ `roma~ `ko~ `niyaro'~ `ita~.￺Our village is continually changing.￻我們的村落不斷地在改變
￹`Misa~`roma~`roma~ `cingra~ `to~ `demak~.￺He is continually doing things differently.￻他不斷的嘗試不同的工作
￹`Sa~`roma~`roma~ `sa~`~ `ko~ `romi'ad~.￺The weather is continually changing.￻天氣變化無常
￹`To~ `roma~ `i~, `ma~`rarom~ `kako~.￺Sometimes I am sad.￻有時候我感悲傷
d.f: ￹￺some * some other * sometimes￻若干，有些有時候 (過些時候) ，改天
